Description: Fragment of a very wide ear-ring made of red jasper with a half circular section, very well polished, one end cut off straight, the other end broken off. Traces from drilling out the inner part.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2, AA[f L 2]
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
